name: The Dream Of Becoming Too Fat
name_original: The Dream Of Becoming Too Fat
description:
Once, Fat Guy fall asleep and had thrilling dream. He was gaining weight and can't stop it. The only way to keep his stomach safe was eating fruit. So help him please!

**Controls:**

Walking LEFT/RIGHT - A/D

Rotating map LEFT/RIGHT - LeftArrow/RightArrow 

Ingame menu - Escape
